word: H5628 - סָרַח - çârach - saw-rakh' - Exceeding - மிகவும்

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - தொங்கு, வீசு, பெரியதாயிரு. சயனி, அழி
to go free, to be unrestrained, to be overrun, to exceed, to overhang, to grow luxuriously
1) to go free, to be unrestrained, to sprawl; overrunning, spreading (participle)
b) (Niphal) to be let loose or dismissed or gone
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to extend (even to excess): - exceeding, hand, spread, stretch self, banish.
Cognate: H5628, H5629, H5630, H5631, H5633, H5636
